name: Playtime Magic Song
description:
Enjoy Playtime Magic Song

Choose your favourite song form Playtime Magic Song: KPOP EDM Rush list and only Touch, hold and drag on 2 sides to control the ball to jump over the tiles.

create an extremely interesting experience for anyone who enjoys Playtime Magic Song.

Best Features :
- Play your favorite songs to bounce along with the music
- Touch control to accompany tiles hop and easy to play
- Attractive environment and picture effects
- really beautiful and nice song to relax of songs to play
- Beat your best score and challenge your friends to the challenge score
- Share your record with your friends.

Let's Download and Have Fun...
